episode.summary: Kashiwagi`s boyfriend goes back to Shirogane for more romantic advice while Kaguya eavesdrops again. Thanks to Shirogane`s advice the first time around, the boy has been dating Kashiwagi, but a month has passed and the two haven`t even held hands yet. To Kaguya, the question of what to do in order to hold hands is so simple that she`s disgusted by it, but for Shirogane, who doesn`t actually have any experience when it comes to romantic relationships, it`s a relief since he feels capable of addressing the problem. However, like the previous occasion, Shirogane`s advice seems to go in an unexpected direction... Source: crunchyroll
